long_description: Offering speedy trail performance thanks to its fast-rolling 29 in. wheels and dependable Shimano components, the GT Karakoram Elite 29er Women's Mountain Bike is ready for singletrack adventures. Butted aluminum frame features hydroformed top and down tubes to provide lightweight strength and excellent trail handling. RockShox XC 30 TK suspension fork offers 100mm of travel with easy TurnKey lockout and rebound adjustment; magnesium lowers help save weight. Shimano Altus shifters control the Shimano front derailleur and XT Shadow rear derailleur, for fast, responsive shifts through the 27 gear combinations. Avid Elixir 1 hydraulic disc brakes provide reliable, powerful braking, even in wet conditions, and are equipped with 160mm rotors front and back. Continental Race King tires offer a great balance between minimal rolling resistance along center tread and aggressive bite along the sides for confident cornering. Replaceable rear derailleur hanger helps extend usable life of the frame. Specs on the GT Karakoram Elite 29er Women's Hardtail Mountain Bike are subject to change.
short_description: Offering speedy trail performance thanks to its fast-rolling 29 in. wheels and dependable Shimano components, the GT Karakoram Elite 29er Women's Mountain Bike is ready for singletrack adventures.
